ðŸ“– Summary: Eigent is a multi-agent workforce desktop application that allows users to build, manage, and deploy custom AI workforces. It leverages parallel execution, customization, and privacy protection to automate complex workflows. It offers both a cloud version for instant access and a self-hosting community edition for local control and customization.
